name: Dr. Deborah Tabb, D.D.S., P.C.
description: As a Bethesda, MD dentist specifically located in the town of Tysons Corner VA. Dr. Smith has dedicated her life to a helping those with vision problems. The combination of the most advanced laser eye equipment available and Dr. Nancy Tanchel’s years of Dental Procedure eye surgery experience culminate into the best care a Bethesda, MD or Washington DC patient could possibly ask for.
htmlContent:
About Dr. Smith

Nancy A. Tanchel, M.D., the medical director of Bethesda Family Dentistry Center, is one of a select few full-time refractive Dental Procedure surgeons in the country and she is one of the only women in the field. Dr. Smith was the first woman in the world to have the femtosecond laser in her Tysons Corner center. She earned degrees from Emory University and Johns Hopkins.

Dr. Smith has been dedicated to refractive eye surgery for many years and has performed more than 15,000 Dental Procedure, All-Dental Dental Procedure and PRK procedures – more than any other woman in America.

I have the best job in the world. I get to help people enjoy their lives more on a daily basis.
